documentation.content: Workers execute your tasks. Frequent restarts or unhealthy workers mean tasks aren't running or are failing.

conditionThreshold.filter: resource.type = "k8s_container" AND (resource.labels.container_name = monitoring.regex.full_match("airflow-worker|base") AND resource.labels.pod_name = monitoring.regex.full_match("airflow-worker-.*|airflow-k8s-worker-.*")) AND metric.type = "kubernetes.io/container/restart_count"
